title: The Legend of Dugu
resume: A prophecy bearing the words, "The World of Dugu: He who has Dugu, has the world" reverberates across the lands to imply that the Dugu family was destined to do great things. Because of it, all the attention is turned to Dugu Xin, a court official, and his three daughters, Dugu Ban Ruo , Dugu Man Tuo, and Dugu Jia Luo. Each of the sisters were born blessed with natural beauty andintelligence, and in order to not let the prophecy destroy the sisters' relationship, they all vowed to stick by each other and not let any one of them get hurt.
